TopicTitle: Bird Sounds in KSC menu... how about Crickets at night?

Articles.Content: Just a thought, now that we see actual day and night lighting conditions in the KSC menu screen, how about make it play a 'Crickets' or night noises track when it is night time instead of the tweeting bird noises? (just do the birds during the day)
Knova is going to hate upon your soul, stop putting k in front of every word it gets really annoying.

I don't even know where the K-syndrome came from.

on topic, I think it would be a nice addition.

genius, though shouldn't it be krickets?

Nope. That horse was beat to dust well over a year ago.
There was another thread suggesting the same thing.
